item.title: Reading .csv Files
item.description: The Test Data Small Medium Big The Code R “Base” - utils::read.csv() readr::read_csv() data.table::fread() Python pandas.read_csv() The Test The Results tl;dr Session Info R Python .main-container { max-width: 1600px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } library(bench) library(kableExtra) library(reticulate); use_condaenv("r-reticulate", required = TRUE) library(scales) library(tidyverse) The Test Data The initial .csv was obtained from Majestic Million CSV . path <- "test-data/majestic_million.csv" test_df <- read_csv("http://downloads.

item.title: Variable Assignment
item.description: R Python C++ Rcpp R var_R <- 1 var_R ## [1] 1 Python var_PY = 1 print(var_PY) ## 1 C++ #include <iostream> int main() { int var_CPP = 1; std::cout << var_CPP; return 0; } ## 1 Rcpp #include <Rcpp.h> // R to/from C++ interface // [[Rcpp::export]] int RCPP_function() { int var_RCPP = 1; return var_RCPP; } RCPP_function() # access the C++ function from R like any other function ## [1] 1
